objective: To obtain a software developer role where I can leverage my technical expertise to develop creative solutions that enhance user experience and drive organizational growth, while also advancing my professional development.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.highlights: Developed and maintained web applications using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Django, Flutter, and WordPress.

experience.title: Python Odoo Developer
experience.highlights: Developed many Odoo ERP apps and modules for the Odoo store and clients, gaining insights into business processes and functionality.

experience.title: Jr. Python/Django Developer
experience.highlights: Interned in web development, contributing to small projects and progressing from static pages to dynamic backend functionality. Developed a streaming website using APIs, enhancing my full-stack development skills.

projects.title: Flutter App for Baby Paradise
projects.description: Developing an E-com app with Flutter and Firebase for shop management, featuring Authentication, Admin panel, user privileges, Product Creation, and Listing.

projects.title: Ecom Website for Baby Paradise
projects.description: Created an E-commerce site for Shop management with basic features, deployed frontend on Netlify and backend on PythonAnywhere.
projects.duration: (Mar 2024 - Present) //More features to discuss and add

projects.title: Image Viewer(Extension)
projects.description: Created a Browser extension to preview images(SVG, PNG, JPG) with an additional feature of pasting svg code and viewing it, which is a useful tool for web developers. Deployed on Microsoft Edge Addons.

projects.title: Resume Maker(Web)
projects.description: Created a resume maker website using JavaScript, JSON, HTML, and CSS, enabling users to quickly generate a resume by inputting their details. Future plans include adding features and migrating to Next.js.
